name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ronald W. SCOTT, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 103
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ronald W. SCOTT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued and Submitted April 21, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Malcolm P. Rosenberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Morristown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
